# NSFontCollection.UserInfoKey

**Structure**

These constants are used as keys in the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSFontCollection/didChangeNotification] `userInfo` dictionary to indicate the changes that have taken place.

## Declaration

```swift
struct UserInfoKey
```

## User Info Keys

- **actionUserInfoKey**: An action was taken. See `NSFontCollectionAction Key Values` for the possible values. An `NSString`.
- **nameUserInfoKey**: The font collection’s name. If renamed, this is the new name. An `NSString`.
- **oldNameUserInfoKey**: Included as a value for the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSFontCollection/oldNameUserInfoKey] key, if present. This is the previous name. An `NSString`.
- **visibilityUserInfoKey**: The visibly of the font collection. An NSNumber containing a value from the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSFontCollection/Visibility] enum.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Responding to Changes

- **didChangeNotification**: Posted whenever a font collection is changed.
- **NSFontCollection.ActionTypeKey**: The following actions are possible values of the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSFontCollection/actionUserInfoKey] in the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSFontCollection/didChangeNotification] `userInfo` method.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
